H0.text: Prostaglandins are the substances whose synthesis is inhibited by aspirin and ibuprofen to reduce pain.

H1.text: Triglycerides are the substances whose synthesis is inhibited by aspirin and ibuprofen to reduce pain.

H2.text: Lipids are the substances whose synthesis is inhibited by aspirin and ibuprofen to reduce pain.

H3.text: Hormones are what aspirin and ibuprofen inhibit the synthesis of to reduce pain.

A4.text: aspirin-like drugs could inhibit the synthesis of prostaglandins.
